short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore documents with ease and float your ToC anywhere!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- ☁️ Float ToC anywhere
- 📐 Resize ToC with drag handle
- 🛫 Click titles to jump
- 🔦 Highlight current section

How to use:
- keyboard shortcut with `command + B`
- context menu with right-click and select "Toggle Floating ToC"
